eu.smartdatalake.simsearch.manager.insitu

Class HttpRestConnector

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.smartdatalake.simsearch.manager.insitu.HttpRestConnector
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IDataConnector

    public class HttpRestConnector
extends Object
implements IDataConnector
    Class that defines all methods available by a HTTP connector. Every HTTP connection to any REST API should support the same query functionality.

      • setSimSearchInstance

        public void setSimSearchInstance(boolean flag)
        Specifies whether this HTTP connection refers to another SimSearch instance or a REST API.
        Parameters:
        flag - True, if connecting to SimSearch REST API; otherwise, False.

      • isSimSearchInstance

        public boolean isSimSearchInstance()
        Examines whether this HTTP connection refers to another SimSearch instance or a REST API.
        Returns:
        True, if connecting to SimSearch REST API; otherwise, False.

      • executeQuery

        public org.apache.http.client.methods.CloseableHttpResponse executeQuery(String query)
        Executes the specified queried against the REST API.
        Parameters:
        query - The query submitted for execution (in JSON).
        Returns:
        The response of the REST API to the submitted query.

      • findSingletonValue

        public Object findSingletonValue(String query)
        Description copied from interface: IDataConnector
        Query that fetches only a single value (i.e. from the first result); Assuming that one value is only needed.
        Specified by:
        findSingletonValue in interface IDataConnector
        Parameters:
        query - The query to be submitted for fetching this value, e.g., an SQL command for the SELECT query.
        Returns:
        An object representing an attribute value (e.g., the value at a specific attribute for a given object identifier).

      • parseElasticSearchResult

        private Object parseElasticSearchResult(String jsonResult)
        Parses the JSON response obtained from a query on a single attribute in ElasticSearch.
        Parameters:
        jsonResult - A string representation of the full response.
        Returns:
        A value on the attribute specified in the query.

      • parseSimSearchResult

        private Object parseSimSearchResult(String jsonResult)
        Parses the JSON response obtained from a Catalog request on a single attribute against another SimSearch instance.
        Parameters:
        jsonResult - A string representation of the full response.
        Returns:
        A value on the attribute specified in the Catalog request.

        public boolean fieldExists(String fieldName)
        Checks whether the given attribute name is available for queries. FIXME: This is currently implemented for .
        Parameters:
        fieldName - The attribute name.
        Returns:
        True, if the attribute exists and contains at least one NOT NULL value; otherwise, False.

      • getSampleValue

        public Object getSampleValue(String fieldName)
        Fetches a sample value from the given attribute. FIXME: This is currently implemented for ElasticSearch only.
        Parameters:
        fieldName - The attribute name.
        Returns:
        A sample value; its data type depends on the attribute.

      • findMaxResultCount

        private int findMaxResultCount()
        Finds out the maximum number of results returned by an HTTP request. CAUTION: This method currently handles only ElasticSearch indices as well as data sources from another SimSearch instance.
        Returns:
        An integer value representing the maximum number of results per HTTP request.

      • getJSONValue

        public int getMaxResultCount()
        Returns the maximum number of results per HTTP request (if supported by the HTTP service).
        Returns:
        An integer value.

      • setMaxResultCount

        public void setMaxResultCount(int maxResultCount)
        Sets the maximum number of results per HTTP request (if supported by the HTTP service).
        Parameters:
        maxResultCount - An integer value to limit the number of returned results.
